text: Dispatching all teams to begin Phase 1 deliverables. Spatial, Film, Product, UX, Brand — go.
Starting retail_plan.md — building is 30m new build, 5m/floor, real robotic fabrication on 6F.
Starting storyboard.md — 45s master cut, 7 scenes, Terrain Boot hero.
Starting collection_overview.md + biodata_spec.md — Terrain Boot 01 is hero, 7-piece lineup.
Starting journey_map.md — biodata scan is optional, designing branching path.
Starting tone_guide.md + naming_system.md — AI/biodata copy rules + DEPARTURE 001 structure.
All teams active. Monitoring for cross-team dependencies.
